channel.title: Need help with SkillCapes
channel.description: On some server's they have in the emote tab something that says Skillcape or Sklcape or something. And when u were a skillcape it does the emote, How do i add that to the emote tab?

item.title: Need help with SkillCapes
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Pwnage Sh0w, post:11, topic:232679”]ok i just now did that so is it supposed to look like this?

 case 185: // clicking most buttons
            actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize);
            if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) {
                println_debug("Case 185: " + actionButtonId);
            }
            switch (actionButtonId) {
            case 52050: sklcape
            if playercape = 14074
            if playercape = 14077
            if playercape = 14080
            if playercape = 14083
            if playercape = 14086
            if playercape = 14089
            if playercape = 14095
            if playercape = 14104
            if playercape = 14107
            if playercape = 14110
            if playercape = 14113
            if playercape = 14119
            if playercape = 14122
            if playercape = 14125
            if playercape = 14128
            if playercape = 14131
            if playercape = 14134
            if playercape = 14137
            if playercape = 14139
            if playercape = 15714
            if playercape = 14092
            case 28164:
            case 28165:
            case 28166:
            case 28168:
            case 28215:
            case 28171:
            case 28170:
            case 28172:
            case 28178:
                break;

            case 28173:
            case 28174:
            case 28169:
            case 28175:
            case 28167:
            case 28176:
            case 28177:
            case 28179:
            case 28180:
                break;

If not can you post what it should look like?[/quote]you’re kinda on the right track. you just forgot to add what each cape does. ill brb with a code ill make or something. Sorta bizzy sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with SkillCapes
item.dc:creator: @Pwnage_Sh0w Pwnage Sh0w
item.description:
@Pwnage_Sh0w wrote:

ok i just now did that so is it supposed to look like this?

 case 185: // clicking most buttons
            actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize);
            if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) {
                println_debug("Case 185: " + actionButtonId);
            }
            switch (actionButtonId) {
            case 52050: sklcape
            if playercape = 14074
            if playercape = 14077
            if playercape = 14080
            if playercape = 14083
            if playercape = 14086
            if playercape = 14089
            if playercape = 14095
            if playercape = 14104
            if playercape = 14107
            if playercape = 14110
            if playercape = 14113
            if playercape = 14119
            if playercape = 14122
            if playercape = 14125
            if playercape = 14128
            if playercape = 14131
            if playercape = 14134
            if playercape = 14137
            if playercape = 14139
            if playercape = 15714
            if playercape = 14092
            case 28164:
            case 28165:
            case 28166:
            case 28168:
            case 28215:
            case 28171:
            case 28170:
            case 28172:
            case 28178:
                break;

            case 28173:
            case 28174:
            case 28169:
            case 28175:
            case 28167:
            case 28176:
            case 28177:
            case 28179:
            case 28180:
                break;

If not can you post what it should look like?

item.title: Need help with SkillCapes
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Pwnage Sh0w, post:9, topic:232679”]ooooooh kk ill do that now…
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2008, 02:03:30 pm[/size][hr]Ok, i did that and it said

Case 185: Action Button: 52050[/quote]ok, so now under case 185, you would add case 52050. every case created in case 185’s field is an action button. so creating case 52050 means that when you click it, it does what you assign it to do. so after you create case 52050, and under it add if playercape = ####" or whatever the code is. And make an if statement for every cape. under each if statement add the emote id that you want each cape to do. Hopefully you get what im saying now.

Read full topic

Ok so down below case 185 are other cases, so i put below those numbers above the word break; i put case (skillcape item ID) right?[/quote]no. if you’re using reapage scape, there should be empty emote tabs, right? click one of those empty emote tabs and look at your run.cmd. tell me what the run.cmd says after you click it. it should say something like action button =…

item.title: Need help with SkillCapes
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Reapage is 317.

go into client.java and search for case 185.

look below it and you’ll see that there are other cases. all the cases in the case 185 before the end of the case are really action buttons now. if you click an emote that hasn’t been signed to anything you can look on your run.cmd and see that something comes up that looks like "case 185, action button ####.

use that action button of whatever emote tab you want and sign it to a case under case 185 like the rest. after that use the if playercape = code for every cape that you want, and use the skillcape emote in the code. if you don’t know what im talking about with the playercape look at what Rog3r said earlier it might help you out.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with SkillCapes

item.title: Need help with SkillCapes
item.dc:creator: @jarrad jarrad
item.description:
@jarrad wrote:

[quote=“Rog3r, post:2, topic:232679”]Thats for a 474 server, if thats what your getting at.

If you want to do the cheaper way, just make it like this:

if (playerEquipment == 8000) {
sendQuest(SCE, 180);
attkCE = 1;
}

if (attkCE == 1) {
castEmote(3959, 750);
attkCE = 0;
}

Something like that …[/quote]
Put a code in that post and tidy it up maybe? - Reapagescape is 377

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with SkillCapes
item.dc:creator: @Pwnage_Sh0w Pwnage Sh0w
item.description:
@Pwnage_Sh0w wrote:

474 Server? I only know what a 508 server is, and a 317 i think it is that. Can you find out for me if Reapage-Scape V1 is a 474 or whatever?

And if they are, can you tell me how to get to wherever i go and what to search for to make those changes you posted above?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with SkillCapes
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Thats for a 474 server, if thats what your getting at.

If you want to do the cheaper way, just make it like this:

if (playerEquipment == 8000) {
sendQuest(SCE, 180);
attkCE = 1;
}

if (attkCE == 1) {
castEmote(3959, 750);
attkCE = 0;
}

Something like that …

Read full topic
